/notes/calendar.title: When do we meet?
/notes/calendar.content:
January 21st 2023 - [Why have a mutual assistance group (MAG)?](01212023.md)
December 3rd 2022 - [Cyber Security, Safety, & Privacy](12032022.md)

/notes/meetings.title: What to expect
/notes/meetings.content:
We will be a small group of likeminded people wanting to learn more about preparedness etc.

The talk will be about an hour with Q&A. There will be drinks and there may be a snack to chat afterwards. We'll probably stay another 2 hours until all talking is exhausted. We like talking.

/notes/why.title: Why do we meet?
/notes/why.content:
1. Grow relationships with local people to encourage each other in preparing for likely scenarios.
2. Help people connect to start mutual assistance groups.
